Project1.title: Student Management
Project1.paragraph: Incorporating a MySQL database with a first look at a modular front end using handlebars, this team project allowed for a front end system that allowed users, once logged in, to select both teachers and classes to be added or removed from their homepage. Heading this project, I was in charge of the database structure, setup, and routes, along with the general layout and design of the front end.
Project1.technology: Javascript, jQuery, node.js, mySQL, Sequelize, Bootstrap and Handlebars

Project2.title: Employee Directory
Project2.paragraph: Using react, our initial exposure to this framework included breaking this application into components, multiple pages through Routes, and passing proper data down where applicable.

Project3.title: Virtual Acystant
Project3.paragraph: Project 3, currently in development. Centered around a Mern stack application, I am working heavily on the React portion of the application, including the Material-UI implementation.

Project4.title: Book Search
Project4.paragraph: Our first Mern stack application. Currently in development
